snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission said auditors failed to review an audit of the bank holding company TierOne, which failed because of bad loans to real estate developers.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission says KPMG auditors John J Aesoph and Darren M Bennett failed to review an audit of the bank holding company TierOne, which failed because of bad loans to real estate developers; asks administrative law judge to bar them.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission said auditors failed to review an audit of the bank holding company TierOne, which failed because of bad loans to real estate developers.

headline.main: S.E.C. Seeks to Penalize 2 Auditors in Bank Case
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Seeks To Penalize 2 Auditors In Bank Case
